name: A.T.M, Ahmed Hossain

name: Tommy Miah
description: Mohammad Ajman Miah, MBE FRSA, better known by his nick name Tommy Miah, is a Bangladeshi-born British chef, owner of the Raj Restaurant and founder of the International Indian Chef of the Year Competition. He is often recognised as the 'Curry King' in Britain.Born: March 28, 1959 (age 64 years), Moulvi Bazar District. Cooking style: Bengali cuisine. Education: Aston Manor School

name: Shelly Nuruzzaman
description: Shelly’s family moved to Britain in the 1960’s and with them they brought a genuine energy and aptitude for Bangladeshi cooking.
